name: Food Safety Training Simulator 2022
description:
A third-person educational simulaton game about food safety and waste management within a workplace. You will play as an employee for a pie making factory where you will carry out your day's worth of tasks.

 The tasks are represented as mini-games which the player must complete and will be scoring upon. You will be scored on your speed and accuracy within the mini-games and will be given a gold, silver or bronze star depending on your score.

Controls:

Movement: WASD or Arrow Keys

Pause/Menu: Escape Key

Interact: Mouse Left Click
